summary: this is a awesome 3 piece mod design that looks really awesome
descriptionHtml:
please place all files in its correct places in the data folder

getting the item
this item can be crafted under leather
or can be added via help edwen

required for crafting
4 leathers and 3 leather strips for each item
i.e main armor,boots and feathers

this mod was also designed for use with unp bodies


whats gonna be new
sadly nothing since i didn't make this mod and i have no experince modding but I would love to see a BBP version were the breast fill the chest plate and bounce nicely and the weight slider doesn't cause the skin to mess up

known issues
seems if you use a weight slider that increase breast size it causes the skin to mess up and look weird
seems there are no textures on the fingers
seems the armor disappears in water and needs to be fixed
credits
all credits go to R0R0N0 on another site for making this mod for me and giving me permission to share it

Anyone wanting to change or edit this mod just ask since ive been given sole permission to do with the mod as i wish
author: R0R0N0
